remarks: Coefficient vector of a polynomial multiplied on the left by a variable power.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Apr-2015.)
statement:
coe1pwmul.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
coe1pwmul.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
coe1pwmul.x $e |- X = ( var1 ` R ) $.
coe1pwmul.n $e |- N = ( mulGrp ` P ) $.
coe1pwmul.e $e |- .^ = ( .g ` N ) $.
coe1pwmul.b $e |- B = ( Base ` P ) $.
coe1pwmul.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` P ) $.
coe1pwmul.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) $.
coe1pwmul.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. B ) $.
coe1pwmul.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. NN0 ) $.
coe1pwmul $p |- ( ph -> ( coe1 ` ( ( D .^ X ) .x. A ) ) = ( x e. NN0 |-> if ( D <_ x , ( ( coe1 ` A ) ` ( x - D ) ) , .0. ) ) ) $.
